name: Harvester of Lies
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Coat of Lies
entries: While wearing their specially prepared coat, the harvester's AC is increase by 2 and it can use its innate spellcasting.

traits.name: Hear Lies
entries: The harvester hears all lies uttered within 1 mile of it and knows the liar's distance and direction while the harvester choses to concentrate.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The harvester can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Trackless
entries: The harvester leaves no tracks to indicate where it has been or where it's headed.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The harvester makes three attacks, only one of which can be sever tongue.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 17).

actions.name: Sever Tongue
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one humanoid {@condition grappled} by the harvester of lies. 33 (8d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have their tongue ripped out. A creature without a tongue cannot speak or cast spells with verbal components. A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damage, doesn't have or need a tongue, or has legendary actions.
A tongue can be reattached within 1 hour of being severed with a successful {@dc 10} Wisdom (Medicine) check, or at can be regrown using magic that replaces lost limbs.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
